revised_title: On the Physical Constitution and Relations of Musical Chords: A Study of Harmonics and Beat Frequencies
tldr: This paper investigates the physical constitution and relations of musical chords, exploring the role of harmonics and beat frequencies in the perception of pitch and dissonance. The author examines the effects of different beat numbers and intervals on the perception of musical chords and proposes a method for creating artificial qualities of tone through the combination of compound tones.
